snippet: The Red Sox said third baseman Pablo Sandoval, in the second year of a five-year, $95-million deal, would begin the season on the bench, in favor of Travis Shaw.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Boston Red Sox announce that Travis Shaw will be their starting third baseman; other MLB news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox said third baseman Pablo Sandoval, in the second year of a five-year, $95-million deal, would begin the season on the bench, in favor of Travis Shaw.

headline.main: Boston’s Pablo Sandoval Loses Job at Third
headline.print_headline: Change of Scene Can’t Help the Mets
